full_summary:
### Telescopic Boom Assembly Fabrication

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Title:** Fabrication of Telescopic Boom Assemblies for the Trent-Severn Waterway National Historic Site

**Reference Number:** CB-716-8657089

#### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number:** 5P300-23-0145/A
* **Tender Closing Date:** Tuesday, November 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** Monday, November 13, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** Thursday, March 29, 2024

#### Description

Parks Canada (PCA) invites bidders to respond to the RFP for the fabrication of telescopic boom assemblies for the Trent-Severn Waterway National Historic Site.

The contract includes:

* Fabrication and creation of drawings under the supervision of a mechanical engineer
* Material supply, sandblasting, and painting of new telescopic boom assemblies
* Refurbishment of existing boom assemblies
* Pickup and delivery of the assemblies

#### Important Submission Information

* Tender documents may be submitted via:
	+ Fax: (343) 585-4589
	+ Email: [soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca)
* Bidders are advised that Parks Canada is not accepting bids via SAP Ariba.
* It is essential to use the official tender ID (given in the document) when submitting the bid.
* Bidders are responsible for any errors resulting from the transmission or receipt of the email.

#### Additional Instructions

* It is recommended that bidders attend a site visit on October 24, 2023, in Peterborough, Ontario, to gain insight into the work requirements.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Late submissions will not be considered.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

#### Points of Contact and Communication

* Contact for the bid submission: Nicholas Moïse
* Email: [nicholas.moise@pc.gc.ca](mailto:nicholas.moise@pc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 585-4589
* Fax: 1-877-558-2349 (Please reference the solicitation number and project name when contacting the contracting authority.)
